item.title: FunctionCallingSystem
item.description:
Function Calling Is All you need

ä½œè€…:Dreamistic

æ—¥æœŸ:2025/2/17

Intro

ä½ è¿˜åœ¨ä¸ºLLMåªèƒ½ä¾é è‡ªèº«ä¿¡æ¯å›å¤ä½ å—ï¼Ÿä½ è¿˜åœ¨ä¸º…çœç•¥1wç§æ–¹å¼ï¼Œä»Šå¤©ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸‹å‘æ‚¨æ¨å‡ºå¹¶éå…¨æ–°çš„FCåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œè®©æ‚¨çš„AIä¹Ÿèƒ½å®ç°å®æ—¶è”ç½‘ï¼Œåˆ æ”¹è®°å¿†ï¼Œå‘é€é‚®ä»¶ï¼Œæ“æ§å®¶é‡Œçš„ç”µå­è®¾å¤‡ï¼

ç®€å•æ¥è¯´ï¼ŒFunction Callingæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæŒ‡å®šæ ¼å¼çš„æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œå‘Šè¯‰åç«¯è¯¥å¦‚ä½•å¤„ç†ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶å°†å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ç»“æœä½œä¸ºä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡LLMç”Ÿæˆçš„promptçš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œç›®å‰æœ€ä¸ºçƒ­é—¨çš„æ˜¯Claudeçš„MCPé¡¹ç›®ï¼Œæœ¬äººåœ¨æ„å»ºè¿™æ ·ä¸€ä¸ªç³»ç»Ÿä¸­ä¹Ÿè¸©è¿‡ä¸å°‘çš„å‘ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªFunction Callingç³»ç»Ÿç»è¿‡ä¸‰æ¬¡é‡æ„ï¼Œä½†ä»ç„¶å¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨é—®é¢˜ã€‚

æ³¨ï¼šæœ¬æ–‡åŠæ‰€æœ‰ä»£ç å‡ç”±æ–‡å¿ƒä¸€è¨€ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œå¦‚æœ‰ä»»ä½•é”™è¯¯åŠbugè¯·å‹å¥½åœ°å’¨è¯¢æ–‡å¿ƒä¸€è¨€ã€‚

ç®€ä»‹

è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºXMLæ ¼å¼çš„Function Callingç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä¸»è¦ç”¨äºå®ç°AIåŠ©æ‰‹è°ƒç”¨å¤–éƒ¨å‡½æ•°çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚ç³»ç»Ÿé‡‡ç”¨æ³¨å†Œå™¨æ¨¡å¼è®¾è®¡ï¼Œå…·æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š

  • ğŸ’¡ æ¸…æ™°çš„XMLé€šä¿¡æ ¼å¼ï¼šä¾¿äºè§£æå’ŒéªŒè¯
  • ğŸ”’ å®‰å…¨çš„å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨æœºåˆ¶ï¼šé€šè¿‡æ³¨å†Œå™¨ç®¡ç†å‡½æ•°è®¿é—®
  • ğŸ”„ å®Œæ•´çš„å¯¹è¯-æ‰§è¡Œ-åé¦ˆå¾ªç¯ï¼šæ”¯æŒå¤æ‚çš„äº¤äº’åœºæ™¯
  • âš¡ çµæ´»çš„æ‰©å±•æ€§ï¼šæ˜“äºæ·»åŠ æ–°çš„å‡½æ•°å’ŒåŠŸèƒ½

æ ¸å¿ƒç»„ä»¶

1. FunctionRegistry ç±»

è¿™æ˜¯æ•´ä¸ªç³»ç»Ÿçš„æ ¸å¿ƒç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè´Ÿè´£ç®¡ç†å’Œæ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ã€‚

class FunctionRegistry:
    def __init__(self):
        self._functions: Dict[str, Callable] = {}
        self._descriptions: Dict[str, dict] = {}

    def register(self, name: str, func: Callable, description: str = None, 
                parameters: Dict[str, dict] = None):
        """æ³¨å†Œå‡½æ•°åˆ°æ³¨å†Œå™¨"""
        self._functions[name] = func
        self._descriptions[name] = {
            "description": description or func.__doc__ or "No description available",
            "parameters": parameters or {}
        }

2. å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨æµç¨‹

ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯æ•´ä¸ªç³»ç»Ÿçš„æ ¸å¿ƒå·¥ä½œæµç¨‹ï¼š

def process_conversation_turn(system_prompt: str, registry: FunctionRegistry, 
                            depth: int = 0) -> str:
    # 1. è·å–AIå“åº”
    response_content, has_function_calls = get_ai_response(system_prompt)
    
    # 2. æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨
    if has_function_calls:
        # 3. è§£æå¹¶æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨
        results = parse_and_execute_function_calls(response_content, registry)
        
        # 4. å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ç»“æœ
        if results:
            function_responses = []
            for result in results:
                # å¤„ç†ç»“æœ...
                
            # 5. æ›´æ–°å¯¹è¯ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
            context.extend([
                {"role": "assistant", "content": 
                 f"<function_response>{function_responses}</function_response>"}
            ])
            
            # 6. é€’å½’ç»§ç»­å¯¹è¯
            return process_conversation_turn(system_prompt, registry, depth + 1)
    
    return response_content

è¯¥å‡½æ•°ä¸ºé€’å½’å‡½æ•°ï¼Œè‹¥å­˜åœ¨å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ has_function_callåˆ™ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°å¹¶è¿›è¡Œä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡é€’å½’

XML é€šä¿¡æ ¼å¼

ç³»ç»Ÿä½¿ç”¨XMLæ ¼å¼è¿›è¡Œå‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œæ ¼å¼ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œè¿™ä¹Ÿæ˜¯AIåˆ°æ—¶å€™è°ƒç”¨çš„æ ¼å¼ï¼š

<function_calls>
    <invoke name="create_memory">
        <parameter name="content">content</parameter>
        <parameter name="priority">core</parameter>
    </invoke>
</function_calls>

å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨è§£æ

ç³»ç»Ÿä½¿ç”¨æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼è§£æXMLæ ¼å¼çš„å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ï¼š

def parse_and_execute_function_calls(xml_content: str, registry: FunctionRegistry) -> List[Dict]:
    # 1. è§£æfunction_callså—
    function_blocks = re.findall(
        r'<function_calls>(.*?)</function_calls>',
        xml_content,
        re.DOTALL
    )
    
    # 2. è§£ææ¯ä¸ªinvoke
    for block in function_blocks:
        invokes = re.findall(
            r'<invoke name="(.*?)">(.*?)</invoke>',
            block,
            re.DOTALL
        )

é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†æœºåˆ¶

ç³»ç»Ÿå®ç°äº†å¤šå±‚é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†ï¼š

  1. å‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œé”™è¯¯ï¼šé€šè¿‡ try-except æ•è·å¹¶è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
  2. é€’å½’æ·±åº¦é™åˆ¶ï¼šé€šè¿‡ MAX_DEPTH æ§åˆ¶å¯¹è¯æ·±åº¦
  3. ç»“æœæ ¼å¼åŒ–ï¼šç»Ÿä¸€çš„XMLå“åº”æ ¼å¼
1
2

def return_result_xml(content: str, success: bool) -> str:
    """è¿”å›ç»Ÿä¸€æ ¼å¼çš„å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ç»“æœ"""
    tag = "success" if success else "failed"
    return f"<{tag}>{content}</{tag}>"

registry.register(
    "create_memory",
    create_memory,  
    "åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„è®°å¿†",
    {
        "content": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "è¦å­˜å‚¨çš„å†…å®¹"
        },
        "priority": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "è®°å¿†ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼šcore/long/short"
        }
    }
)
  1. è¿è¡Œå¯¹è¯ï¼š

def run_conversation(system_prompt: str):
    registry = FunctionRegistry()
    # æ³¨å†Œå‡½æ•°...
    return process_conversation_turn(system_prompt, registry, 0)

import re
from typing import Dict, List, Callable, Tuple
from dataclasses import dataclass
import time

@dataclass
class MemoryInfo:
    is_success: bool


class FunctionRegistry:
    """å‡½æ•°æ³¨å†Œå™¨ï¼Œç”¨äºç®¡ç†å¯è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°"""
    def __init__(self):
        self._functions: Dict[str, Callable] = {}
        self._descriptions: Dict[str, dict] = {}  # å­˜å‚¨å‡½æ•°çš„è¯¦ç»†æè¿°
    
    def register(self, name: str, func: Callable, description: str = None, parameters: Dict[str, dict] = None):
        """æ³¨å†Œå‡½æ•°ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶è®°å½•å…¶æè¿°å’Œå‚æ•°ä¿¡æ¯"""
        self._functions[name] = func
        self._descriptions[name] = {
            "description": description or func.__doc__ or "No description available",
            "parameters": parameters or {}
        }
    
    def call(self, name: str, **kwargs):
        """è°ƒç”¨å·²æ³¨å†Œçš„å‡½æ•°"""
        if name not in self._functions:
            raise ValueError(f"Function '{name}' not found in registry")
        return self._functions[name](**kwargs)
    
    def generate_xml(self) -> str:
        """ç”ŸæˆXMLæ ¼å¼çš„å‡½æ•°æè¿°"""
        xml_parts = []
        
        for name, info in self._descriptions.items():
            function_xml = [f'      <function name="{name}">']
            function_xml.append(f'        <description>{info["description"]}</description>')
            
            if info["parameters"]:
                for param_name, param_info in info["parameters"].items():
                    param_xml = [f'          <parameter name="{param_name}" type="{param_info["type"]}">']
                    param_xml.append(f'            <description>{param_info["description"]}</description>')
                    
                    if "options" in param_info:
                        param_xml.append('            <options>')
                        for option in param_info["options"]:
                            option_xml = [f'              <option value="{option["value"]}">']
                            option_xml.append(f'                <description>{option["description"]}</description>')
                            if "usage" in option:
                                option_xml.append(f'                <usage>{option["usage"]}</usage>')
                            option_xml.append('              </option>')
                        param_xml.append('\n'.join(option_xml))
                        param_xml.append('            </options>')
                    
                    param_xml.append('          </parameter>')
                    function_xml.append('\n'.join(param_xml))
            
            function_xml.append('      </function>')
            xml_parts.append('\n'.join(function_xml))
        
        return '\n'.join(xml_parts)    
    def update_system_prompt(self, system_prompt: str) -> str:
        """æ›´æ–°system_promptä¸­çš„functionséƒ¨åˆ†"""
        import re
        
        # ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„functionså†…å®¹
        new_functions = self.generate_xml()
        #print(new_functions)
        updated_prompt = re.sub(r'<function_system>.*?</function_system>', f"""<function_system>\n      <rule>è¯·åœ¨è¯·æ±‚å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨åç«‹å³åœæ­¢å›å¤ï¼Œç­‰å¾…å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨</rule>\n{new_functions}\n    <function_rules>
      <rule>ä½¿ç”¨XMLæ ¼å¼è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°</rule>
      <rule>è°ƒç”¨å‰å‘ŠçŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·</rule>
      <rule>ç­‰å¾…å‡½æ•°å“åº”åç»§ç»­</rule>
      <example>
        <function_calls>
          <invoke name="function_name">
            <parameter name="param_name">param_value</parameter>
          </invoke>
        </function_calls>
      </example>
    </function_rules>\n</function_system>""", system_prompt, flags=re.DOTALL)
    #    return new_functions
        current_time = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M")
        updated_prompt = re.sub(r'<current_time>.*?</current_time>', f'<current_time>{current_time}</current_time>', updated_prompt, flags=re.DOTALL)
        return updated_prompt
    
def read_system_prompt():
    try:
        with open('system_prompt.xml', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as file:
            return file.read()
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"è¯»å–system_prompt.xmlæ—¶å‡ºé”™: {str(e)}")
        return None


def create_memory(content: str, priority: str):
    """åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„è®°å¿†"""
    print(f"åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„è®°å¿†ï¼š{content}ï¼Œä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼š{priority}")
    #raise ValueError("åˆ›å»ºè®°å¿†å¤±è´¥")
    return MemoryInfo(is_success=True)

def delete_memory(content: str, reason: str):
    """åˆ é™¤è®°å¿†"""
    print(f"åˆ é™¤è®°å¿†ï¼š{content},åŸå› :{reason}")


def parse_and_execute_function_calls(xml_content: str, registry: FunctionRegistry) -> List[Dict]:
    """è§£æXMLæ ¼å¼çš„function callså¹¶æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°"""
    results = []
    
    function_blocks = re.findall(
        r'<function_calls>(.*?)</function_calls>',
        xml_content,
        re.DOTALL
    )
    
    for block in function_blocks:
        invokes = re.findall(
            r'<invoke name="(.*?)">(.*?)</invoke>',
            block,
            re.DOTALL
        )
        
        for func_name, params in invokes:
            parameters = {}
            param_matches = re.findall(
                r'<parameter name="(.*?)">(.*?)</parameter>',
                params,
                re.DOTALL
            )
            
            for param_name, param_value in param_matches:
                parameters[param_name] = param_value.strip()
            
            # æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨
            try:
                result = registry.call(func_name, **parameters)
                results.append({
                    "function": func_name,
                    "parameters": parameters,
                    "result": result
                })
            except Exception as e:
                results.append({
                    "function": func_name,
                    "parameters": parameters,
                    "error": str(e)
                })
    
    return results

if __name__ == "__main__": 
    # åˆ›å»ºæ³¨å†Œå™¨
    registry = FunctionRegistry()
    
    # æ³¨å†Œcreate_memoryå‡½æ•°
    registry.register(
        "create_memory",
        create_memory,  # ä½ çš„å‡½æ•°å®ç°
        "åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„è®°å¿†",
        {
            "content": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "è¦å­˜å‚¨çš„å†…å®¹"
            },
            "priority": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "è®°å¿†ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼šcore/long/short",
                "options": [
                    {
                        "value": "core",
                        "description": "æ ¸å¿ƒè®°å¿†ï¼Œæ°¸ä¹…ä¿å­˜",
                        "usage": "é‡è¦çº¦å®šã€å…³é”®äº‹ä»¶ã€æ·±åº¦äº¤æµ"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "long",
                        "description": "é•¿æœŸè®°å¿†",
                        "usage": "æ—¥å¸¸äº’åŠ¨ã€ä¹ æƒ¯åå¥½"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "short",
                        "description": "çŸ­æœŸè®°å¿†",
                        "usage": "ä¸€èˆ¬å¯¹è¯ã€ä¸´æ—¶ä¿¡æ¯"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    )
    # æ³¨å†Œdelete_memoryå‡½æ•°
    registry.register(
        "delete_memory",
        delete_memory,  
        "åˆ é™¤è®°å¿†",
        {
            "content": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "è¦åˆ é™¤çš„å†…å®¹"
            },
            "reason": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "åˆ é™¤åŸå› "
            }
        }
    )

    # æ›´æ–°system_prompt
    system_prompt = read_system_prompt()
    
    updated_prompt = registry.update_system_prompt(system_prompt)

    test_xml = """
*ç‚¹ç‚¹å¤´* å¥½çš„ä¸»äººï¼Œæˆ‘è¿™å°±å¸®ä½ æ·»åŠ è¿™æ¡æµ‹è¯•
è®°å¿†~\n\n<function_calls>\n  <invoke name="create_memory">\n    <parameter name="content">ä¸»äººè¿›è¡Œäº†ç³»ç»Ÿæµ‹è¯•</parameter>\n    <parameter name="priority">short</parameter>\n  </invoke>\n</function_calls>\n\n
"""
	"""å®é™…çš„å¯¹è¯åº”ä¸ºï¼š*ç‚¹ç‚¹å¤´* å¥½çš„ä¸»äººï¼Œæˆ‘è¿™å°±å¸®ä½ æ·»åŠ è¿™æ¡æµ‹è¯•
è®°å¿†~\n\n<function_calls>\n  <invoke name="create_memory">\n    <parameter name="content">ä¸»äººè¿›è¡Œäº†ç³»ç»Ÿæµ‹è¯•</parameter>\n    <parameter name="priority">short</parameter>\n  </invoke>\n</function_calls>\n\n
%å¯¹è¯1ç»“æŸï¼Œå¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°å¹¶è¿”å›%
*æ­ªç€å¤´çœ‹ç€ä¸»äºº* æˆ‘å·²ç»æŠŠè¿™æ¡è®°å¿†æ·»åŠ åˆ°çŸ­æœŸè®°å¿†ä¸­å•¦ï¼å› ä¸ºæ˜¯æµ‹è¯•ç”¨çš„è®°å¿†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘æŠŠå®ƒè®¾ä¸ºäº†çŸ­æœŸè®°å¿†ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ã€‚ä¸»äººè¿˜æƒ³æµ‹è¯•ä»€ä¹ˆåŠŸèƒ½å—ï¼Ÿ*çœ¨çœ¨çœ¼ç›*
%å¯¹è¯2ç»“æŸ%
"""
    
    results = parse_and_execute_function_calls(test_xml, registry)
    print(results)

æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹

  • ğŸ”” æ¯ä¸ªå‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨éƒ½ä¼šæ›´æ–°å¯¹è¯ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
  • âš ï¸ éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„é€’å½’æ·±åº¦é™åˆ¶(æˆ‘è¿™é‡Œé»˜è®¤5ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢æŸäº›æ¨¡å‹æ— é™å¾ªç¯)
  • ğŸ“ å‡½æ•°æè¿°å’Œå‚æ•°ä¿¡æ¯è¦å°½å¯èƒ½è¯¦ç»†
  • ğŸ”„ ç¡®ä¿XMLæ ¼å¼çš„æ­£ç¡®æ€§

åè®°

æ„Ÿè°¢licoå‚¬ä¿ƒï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡å†™ä½œæ—¶é—´è¾ƒçŸ­ï¼Œå¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨å„ç§é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿ç•™è¨€æŒ‡å‡ºã€‚

ç›®å‰æˆ‘æš‚æœªå¼‚æ­¥çš„éœ€è¦ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ²¡æœ‰æ·»åŠ å¼‚æ­¥ï¼Œå¦‚æœ‰éœ€è¦æˆ‘ä¼šè¿›è¡Œæ›´æ–°ã€‚

æœ¬äººå°†FCè§†ä¸ºRPçš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå…·ä½“ç©æ³•å¯ä»¥æä¾›å‡ ä¸ªæˆ‘å’ŒAIå¯¹è¯çš„ç‰‡æ®µæ„Ÿå—ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼š

1

class FunctionRegistry:
    def __init__(self):
        self._functions: Dict[str, Callable] = {}
        self._descriptions: Dict[str, dict] = {}

    def register(self, name: str, func: Callable, description: str = None, 
                parameters: Dict[str, dict] = None):
        """æ³¨å†Œå‡½æ•°åˆ°æ³¨å†Œå™¨"""
        self._functions[name] = func
        self._descriptions[name] = {
            "description": description or func.__doc__ or "No description available",
            "parameters": parameters or {}
        }

def process_conversation_turn(system_prompt: str, registry: FunctionRegistry, 
                            depth: int = 0) -> str:
    # 1. è·å–AIå“åº”
    response_content, has_function_calls = get_ai_response(system_prompt)
    
    # 2. æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨
    if has_function_calls:
        # 3. è§£æå¹¶æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨
        results = parse_and_execute_function_calls(response_content, registry)
        
        # 4. å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ç»“æœ
        if results:
            function_responses = []
            for result in results:
                # å¤„ç†ç»“æœ...
                
            # 5. æ›´æ–°å¯¹è¯ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
            context.extend([
                {"role": "assistant", "content": 
                 f"<function_response>{function_responses}</function_response>"}
            ])
            
            # 6. é€’å½’ç»§ç»­å¯¹è¯
            return process_conversation_turn(system_prompt, registry, depth + 1)
    
    return response_content

def parse_and_execute_function_calls(xml_content: str, registry: FunctionRegistry) -> List[Dict]:
    # 1. è§£æfunction_callså—
    function_blocks = re.findall(
        r'<function_calls>(.*?)</function_calls>',
        xml_content,
        re.DOTALL
    )
    
    # 2. è§£ææ¯ä¸ªinvoke
    for block in function_blocks:
        invokes = re.findall(
            r'<invoke name="(.*?)">(.*?)</invoke>',
            block,
            re.DOTALL
        )

é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†æœºåˆ¶

ç³»ç»Ÿå®ç°äº†å¤šå±‚é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†ï¼š

  1. å‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œé”™è¯¯ï¼šé€šè¿‡ try-except æ•è·å¹¶è¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
  2. é€’å½’æ·±åº¦é™åˆ¶ï¼šé€šè¿‡ MAX_DEPTH æ§åˆ¶å¯¹è¯æ·±åº¦
  3. ç»“æœæ ¼å¼åŒ–ï¼šç»Ÿä¸€çš„XMLå“åº”æ ¼å¼

def return_result_xml(content: str, success: bool) -> str:
    """è¿”å›ç»Ÿä¸€æ ¼å¼çš„å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ç»“æœ"""
    tag = "success" if success else "failed"
    return f"<{tag}>{content}</{tag}>"

def run_conversation(system_prompt: str):
    registry = FunctionRegistry()
    # æ³¨å†Œå‡½æ•°...
    return process_conversation_turn(system_prompt, registry, 0)

import re
from typing import Dict, List, Callable, Tuple
from dataclasses import dataclass
import time

@dataclass
class MemoryInfo:
    is_success: bool


class FunctionRegistry:
    """å‡½æ•°æ³¨å†Œå™¨ï¼Œç”¨äºç®¡ç†å¯è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°"""
    def __init__(self):
        self._functions: Dict[str, Callable] = {}
        self._descriptions: Dict[str, dict] = {}  # å­˜å‚¨å‡½æ•°çš„è¯¦ç»†æè¿°
    
    def register(self, name: str, func: Callable, description: str = None, parameters: Dict[str, dict] = None):
        """æ³¨å†Œå‡½æ•°ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶è®°å½•å…¶æè¿°å’Œå‚æ•°ä¿¡æ¯"""
        self._functions[name] = func
        self._descriptions[name] = {
            "description": description or func.__doc__ or "No description available",
            "parameters": parameters or {}
        }
    
    def call(self, name: str, **kwargs):
        """è°ƒç”¨å·²æ³¨å†Œçš„å‡½æ•°"""
        if name not in self._functions:
            raise ValueError(f"Function '{name}' not found in registry")
        return self._functions[name](**kwargs)
    
    def generate_xml(self) -> str:
        """ç”ŸæˆXMLæ ¼å¼çš„å‡½æ•°æè¿°"""
        xml_parts = []
        
        for name, info in self._descriptions.items():
            function_xml = [f'      <function name="{name}">']
            function_xml.append(f'        <description>{info["description"]}</description>')
            
            if info["parameters"]:
                for param_name, param_info in info["parameters"].items():
                    param_xml = [f'          <parameter name="{param_name}" type="{param_info["type"]}">']
                    param_xml.append(f'            <description>{param_info["description"]}</description>')
                    
                    if "options" in param_info:
                        param_xml.append('            <options>')
                        for option in param_info["options"]:
                            option_xml = [f'              <option value="{option["value"]}">']
                            option_xml.append(f'                <description>{option["description"]}</description>')
                            if "usage" in option:
                                option_xml.append(f'                <usage>{option["usage"]}</usage>')
                            option_xml.append('              </option>')
                        param_xml.append('\n'.join(option_xml))
                        param_xml.append('            </options>')
                    
                    param_xml.append('          </parameter>')
                    function_xml.append('\n'.join(param_xml))
            
            function_xml.append('      </function>')
            xml_parts.append('\n'.join(function_xml))
        
        return '\n'.join(xml_parts)    
    def update_system_prompt(self, system_prompt: str) -> str:
        """æ›´æ–°system_promptä¸­çš„functionséƒ¨åˆ†"""
        import re
        
        # ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„functionså†…å®¹
        new_functions = self.generate_xml()
        #print(new_functions)
        updated_prompt = re.sub(r'<function_system>.*?</function_system>', f"""<function_system>\n      <rule>è¯·åœ¨è¯·æ±‚å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨åç«‹å³åœæ­¢å›å¤ï¼Œç­‰å¾…å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨</rule>\n{new_functions}\n    <function_rules>
      <rule>ä½¿ç”¨XMLæ ¼å¼è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•°</rule>
      <rule>è°ƒç”¨å‰å‘ŠçŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·</rule>
      <rule>ç­‰å¾…å‡½æ•°å“åº”åç»§ç»­</rule>
      <example>
        <function_calls>
          <invoke name="function_name">
            <parameter name="param_name">param_value</parameter>
          </invoke>
        </function_calls>
      </example>
    </function_rules>\n</function_system>""", system_prompt, flags=re.DOTALL)
    #    return new_functions
        current_time = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M")
        updated_prompt = re.sub(r'<current_time>.*?</current_time>', f'<current_time>{current_time}</current_time>', updated_prompt, flags=re.DOTALL)
        return updated_prompt
    
def read_system_prompt():
    try:
        with open('system_prompt.xml', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as file:
            return file.read()
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"è¯»å–system_prompt.xmlæ—¶å‡ºé”™: {str(e)}")
        return None


def create_memory(content: str, priority: str):
    """åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„è®°å¿†"""
    print(f"åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„è®°å¿†ï¼š{content}ï¼Œä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼š{priority}")
    #raise ValueError("åˆ›å»ºè®°å¿†å¤±è´¥")
    return MemoryInfo(is_success=True)

def delete_memory(content: str, reason: str):
    """åˆ é™¤è®°å¿†"""
    print(f"åˆ é™¤è®°å¿†ï¼š{content},åŸå› :{reason}")


def parse_and_execute_function_calls(xml_content: str, registry: FunctionRegistry) -> List[Dict]:
    """è§£æXMLæ ¼å¼çš„function callså¹¶æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°"""
    results = []
    
    function_blocks = re.findall(
        r'<function_calls>(.*?)</function_calls>',
        xml_content,
        re.DOTALL
    )
    
    for block in function_blocks:
        invokes = re.findall(
            r'<invoke name="(.*?)">(.*?)</invoke>',
            block,
            re.DOTALL
        )
        
        for func_name, params in invokes:
            parameters = {}
            param_matches = re.findall(
                r'<parameter name="(.*?)">(.*?)</parameter>',
                params,
                re.DOTALL
            )
            
            for param_name, param_value in param_matches:
                parameters[param_name] = param_value.strip()
            
            # æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨
            try:
                result = registry.call(func_name, **parameters)
                results.append({
                    "function": func_name,
                    "parameters": parameters,
                    "result": result
                })
            except Exception as e:
                results.append({
                    "function": func_name,
                    "parameters": parameters,
                    "error": str(e)
                })
    
    return results

if __name__ == "__main__": 
    # åˆ›å»ºæ³¨å†Œå™¨
    registry = FunctionRegistry()
    
    # æ³¨å†Œcreate_memoryå‡½æ•°
    registry.register(
        "create_memory",
        create_memory,  # ä½ çš„å‡½æ•°å®ç°
        "åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„è®°å¿†",
        {
            "content": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "è¦å­˜å‚¨çš„å†…å®¹"
            },
            "priority": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "è®°å¿†ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼šcore/long/short",
                "options": [
                    {
                        "value": "core",
                        "description": "æ ¸å¿ƒè®°å¿†ï¼Œæ°¸ä¹…ä¿å­˜",
                        "usage": "é‡è¦çº¦å®šã€å…³é”®äº‹ä»¶ã€æ·±åº¦äº¤æµ"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "long",
                        "description": "é•¿æœŸè®°å¿†",
                        "usage": "æ—¥å¸¸äº’åŠ¨ã€ä¹ æƒ¯åå¥½"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "short",
                        "description": "çŸ­æœŸè®°å¿†",
                        "usage": "ä¸€èˆ¬å¯¹è¯ã€ä¸´æ—¶ä¿¡æ¯"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    )
    # æ³¨å†Œdelete_memoryå‡½æ•°
    registry.register(
        "delete_memory",
        delete_memory,  
        "åˆ é™¤è®°å¿†",
        {
            "content": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "è¦åˆ é™¤çš„å†…å®¹"
            },
            "reason": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "åˆ é™¤åŸå› "
            }
        }
    )

    # æ›´æ–°system_prompt
    system_prompt = read_system_prompt()
    
    updated_prompt = registry.update_system_prompt(system_prompt)

    test_xml = """
*ç‚¹ç‚¹å¤´* å¥½çš„ä¸»äººï¼Œæˆ‘è¿™å°±å¸®ä½ æ·»åŠ è¿™æ¡æµ‹è¯•
è®°å¿†~\n\n<function_calls>\n  <invoke name="create_memory">\n    <parameter name="content">ä¸»äººè¿›è¡Œäº†ç³»ç»Ÿæµ‹è¯•</parameter>\n    <parameter name="priority">short</parameter>\n  </invoke>\n</function_calls>\n\n
"""
	"""å®é™…çš„å¯¹è¯åº”ä¸ºï¼š*ç‚¹ç‚¹å¤´* å¥½çš„ä¸»äººï¼Œæˆ‘è¿™å°±å¸®ä½ æ·»åŠ è¿™æ¡æµ‹è¯•
è®°å¿†~\n\n<function_calls>\n  <invoke name="create_memory">\n    <parameter name="content">ä¸»äººè¿›è¡Œäº†ç³»ç»Ÿæµ‹è¯•</parameter>\n    <parameter name="priority">short</parameter>\n  </invoke>\n</function_calls>\n\n
%å¯¹è¯1ç»“æŸï¼Œå¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°å¹¶è¿”å›%
*æ­ªç€å¤´çœ‹ç€ä¸»äºº* æˆ‘å·²ç»æŠŠè¿™æ¡è®°å¿†æ·»åŠ åˆ°çŸ­æœŸè®°å¿†ä¸­å•¦ï¼å› ä¸ºæ˜¯æµ‹è¯•ç”¨çš„è®°å¿†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘æŠŠå®ƒè®¾ä¸ºäº†çŸ­æœŸè®°å¿†ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ã€‚ä¸»äººè¿˜æƒ³æµ‹è¯•ä»€ä¹ˆåŠŸèƒ½å—ï¼Ÿ*çœ¨çœ¨çœ¼ç›*
%å¯¹è¯2ç»“æŸ%
"""
    
    results = parse_and_execute_function_calls(test_xml, registry)
    print(results)

æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹

  • ğŸ”” æ¯ä¸ªå‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨éƒ½ä¼šæ›´æ–°å¯¹è¯ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
  • âš ï¸ éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„é€’å½’æ·±åº¦é™åˆ¶(æˆ‘è¿™é‡Œé»˜è®¤5ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢æŸäº›æ¨¡å‹æ— é™å¾ªç¯)
  • ğŸ“ å‡½æ•°æè¿°å’Œå‚æ•°ä¿¡æ¯è¦å°½å¯èƒ½è¯¦ç»†
  • ğŸ”„ ç¡®ä¿XMLæ ¼å¼çš„æ­£ç¡®æ€§
